required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Different Levels of Plant-based Ingredients on Post-prandial Glucose in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The study is designed to determine the extent to which foods containing different levels of plant-based ingredients affect blood glucose responses in healthy subjects.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Post-prandial blood glucose area under the curve

secondary_outcome.measure: Post-prandial insulin area under the curve

arm_group.description: Low level addition of plant-based ingredients
Medium level addition of plant-based ingredients
High level addition of plant-based ingredients

intervention.intervention_name: no added plant-based ingredients to starchy meal
intervention.description: no added plant-based ingredients to starchy meal

intervention.intervention_name: Low level plant-based ingredients added to starchy meal
intervention.description: Low level plant-based ingredients added to starchy meal

intervention.intervention_name: Medium level plant-based ingredients added to starchy meal
intervention.description: Medium level plant-based ingredients added to starchy meal

intervention.intervention_name: High level plant-based ingredients added to starchy meal
intervention.description: High level plant-based ingredients added to starchy meal
